name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Backend Engineer skilled in **Python**, **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Node.js** for developing and optimizing distributed systems and fault-tolerant architectures. Demonstrated expertise in building robust data pipelines, managing SQL and **NoSQL** databases using **RDS/PostgreSQL** and **DynamoDB**, and implementing **event-driven architectures**. Proven success in leveraging **machine learning** and **AI coding assistants**, while maintaining a strong focus on **data quality** and **performance tuning**. Committed to creating scalable solutions with **horizontal scaling** and **self-healing pipelines**, alongside implementing **automated monitoring** and adhering to **SLOs**. Excellent communication skills with a history of delivering high-quality technical documentation and service cataloging, ensuring seamless collaboration within teams. A proactive contributor to system design and automation in diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained distributed systems using **Python**, achieving optimal data flow and processing efficiency across various components.
Leveraged **AWS** services such as **DynamoDB**, **S3**, and **RDS/PostgreSQL** to ensure reliable data storage and retrieval, maintaining **99.9%** uptime for applications.
Implemented concurrency patterns and event-driven architectures, significantly enhancing system responsiveness and user satisfaction by reducing latency by **25%**.
Designed robust data pipelines using **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, ensuring high data quality and fault tolerance across multiple services.
Collaborated on technical documentation and service cataloging practices to streamline onboarding processes, improving team efficiency by **15%**.
Utilized **GitHub Copilot** and **AI coding assistants** to enhance coding speed and accuracy, reducing code review cycles by **20%**.
Created automated monitoring practices and self-healing pipelines to proactively resolve issues and maintain high system availability metrics aligned with SLOs.
Executed CI/CD processes using **Docker** and **AWS**, achieving seamless integration and deployment, while reducing overall deployment times by **80%**.

- Developed scalable backend services using **Node.js** and **Python**, focusing on **distributed systems** and **event-driven architectures** to enhance performance and reliability.
- Implemented **AWS** services, including **DynamoDB** and **S3**, optimizing data pipelines and achieving a **50% improvement** in data retrieval times.
- Designed and executed CI/CD strategies utilizing **Jenkins**, **AWS CodePipeline**, and **Terraform**, leading to a streamlined deployment process with a **30% decrease** in production issues.
- Conducted performance tuning and fault tolerance assessments, ensuring high availability and **99.9% uptime** across services.
- Created robust monitoring solutions to proactively track system health metrics aligned with **SLOs**, enabling efficient fault isolation and resolution of downtime incidents.
- Developed technical documentation and maintained a service catalog, improving team knowledge sharing and system design clarity across the engineering team.

Developed scalable backend systems using **Python** and **Node.js** with **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring high performance and versatility in distributed environments.
Implemented **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, including **RDS/PostgreSQL** and **DynamoDB**, achieving a **99.9%** uptime in data access and integrity.
Designed and executed **data pipelines** and **event-driven architectures**, optimizing data flow and processing time by **25%**.
Optimized code and system performance through **performance tuning** and by utilizing **concurrency patterns**, improving system efficiency by **30%**.
Automated deployment and monitoring processes using **CI/CD** practices, enhancing deployment speed by **50%** and reducing downtime with **self-healing pipelines**.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, demonstrating strong **communication skills** and contributing to comprehensive **technical documentation**.

skills:

	Python, Java, JavaScript, Go, SQL, Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript

	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ, CQRS

	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	RESTful API design, API Gateway

	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, NoSQL, DynamoDB

	Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, automated monitoring, CI/CD, fault tolerance, performance tuning, self-healing pipelines

	AWS (EKS, RDS, S3, CloudFront), Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack, data pipelines

**Other**
	Microservices, distributed systems, concurrency patterns, event-driven architectures, machine learning, AI coding assistants (GitHub Copilot), technical documentation, data quality, data isolation, horizontal scaling, service cataloging, system design, SLOs, Agile/Scrum methodologies, communication skills, Data structures and algorithms
